pgrid.util
Class Reflector

java.lang.Object
  pgrid.util.Reflector

public class Reflector
extends Object

This class provides functions to create objects on runtime and invoke its methods on runtime. Example: 

 Class partypes[] = new Class[1];
 partypes[0] = String.class;
 Object args[] = new Object[1];
 args[0] = "Hello";
 String retval = (String)Reflector.invokeShared("test.helloWorld", "echo", partypes, args);
 System.out.println(retval);

Version:
1.0 2005/06/01
Author:
Roman Schmidt
